content.raw: I wonder if it might be a good idea to have `dart::constraint::WeldJointConstraint` offer a way to set the relative transform of the constraint. It makes sense to set it automatically during construction, but it seems too presumptuous to me to think that the relative transforms of the bodies at that moment is definitely what the user will want the relative transform of the constraint to be.
